Package library

Class Publication

java.lang.Object
library.Publication
Direct Known Subclasses:
Video
public class Publication extends Object
A library resource that can be checked out by a patron.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Professor George F. Rice
Licensed under:
Gnu General Public License 3.0

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • Publication

      public Publication(String title, String author, int copyright)
      Creates a Publication instance. The year of copyright must be between 1900 and the present.
      Parameters:
      title - the name of the library
      author - the principal creator of this resource
      copyright - the year in which this publication was released or registered
      Since:
      1.0

  • Method Details

    • checkOut

      public void checkOut(String patron)
      Notes the patron who borrowed this publication along with the due date The Patron is a string, with no data validation. This will require a lot of discipline on the part of the libraries to make this field useful.
      Parameters:
      patron - the identity of the person borrowing this publication \ * @since 1.0

    • checkIn

      public void checkIn()
      Notes that this publication has been returned
      Since:
      1.0
